name: Oath of Vengeance
description: Paladins of Vengeance pursue justice through relentless punishment of their foes.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific paladin levels.

3.name: Abjure Enemy
3.description: You frighten or restrain a sworn foe.

3.name: Vow of Enmity
3.description: You gain advantage on attacks against a chosen enemy.

7.name: Relentless Avenger
7.description: You can move after opportunity attacks without provoking.

15.name: Soul of Vengeance
15.description: You can make reaction attacks against your sworn enemy.

20.name: Avenging Angel
20.description: You gain flight and frighten enemies with your presence.
